General.Name: QingCloud Technologies Corp.
General.Description: QingCloud Technologies Corp. provides cloud services and digital solutions in China. It offers public cloud products, including calculate, database and cache, container, message queues and middleware, storage, domain names and websites, network, big data, audio, video service, and security service, O&M and monitoring, and access and authorization, private cloud products, such as enterprise cloud, Yunyijie, unstructured data storage, NeonSAN distributed block storage, enterprise cloud all-in-one machine, Yunyijie all-in-one machine, storage all-in-one, NeonSAN storage appliance, EHPC elastic high performance computing platform, and iFCloud multi-cloud management; KubeSphere enterprise edition, container machine, KubeSphere cloud, KubeSphere open source community, and Xinchuang cloud platform, container cloud, yijie, virtualization, storage, and desktop cloud products. The company provides hybrid cloud, computing power, Safety, business continuity, hosted cloud, Data Analytics and Data Lakes, and internet of things solutions. It serves finance, medical health, educate, transportation and logistics, media, video, e-commerce, and government affairs industries. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Chaolai Science and Technology Industrial Park, Beijing, China, 100020

AddressData.Street: Chaolai Science and Technology Industrial Park
